overview: Ride along with the mechanic to see him service vehicles and save pussies from being stranded with their car problems! Roxie Blakhart is a hot babe that has some issues with a classic car so she took it into the shop. She owes too much money so she works out a sucky fucky deal with the mechanic.  Ride along with the mechanic to see him service vehicles and save pussies from being stranded with their car problems! Jocelyn Stone is a cute 20-year old that gets stranded on the side of the road with a broken-down car. See her fuck for cash!
title: Roadside XXX 7
